= DSP =
We run [http://www.dis.uniroma1.it/~demetres/experim/dsp/README.txt DSP] with [http://code.google.com/p/aprof/source/browse/trunk/benchmark/dsp/scripts/aprof_benchmark1.txt this input]. We measure execution time with the _time_ command.
Under GNU/Linux, space is measured with:
{{{
cat /proc/PID/status | grep VmPeak
}}}

== Download DSP ==
{{{
svn co http://aprof.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/benchmark/dsp
}}}

== Build DSP and run under Aprof ==
{{{
cd aprof_valgrind
make
time ./inst/bin/valgrind --tool=aprof path/to/benchmark/dsp/bin/dsp < path/to/benchmark/dsp/scripts/aprof/aprof_benchmark1.txt
}}}

== Platform ==

=== P1 ===
  * Macbook 5,1
  * Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU     P7350  @ 2.00GHz
  * 2GB DDR3
  * Ubuntu 11.04 *32bit* 

=== P2 ===
  * Macbook 5,1
  * Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU     P7350  @ 2.00GHz
  * 4GB DDR3
  * Ubuntu 11.04 *64bit* 

=== P3 ===
 * Macbook 5,1
  * Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU     P7350  @ 2.00GHz
  * 4GB DDR3
  * Mac OS X 10.5.8

== Perfomance reference ==
{{{
P1 - DSP(native): space 15696 kB ~ time real 0.36 sec
P1 - DSP(callgrind): space 73308 kB ~  time real 16.08 sec
P1 - DSP(callgrind --cache-sim=yes): space 73308 ~ time real 0m55.567s
P1 - DSP(memcheck): space 145236 kB ~ time real 9.85 sec
P1 - DSP(TOOL:none): space 59372 kB ~ time real 0m2.010s
P3 - DSP(native): space 16310 kB ~ time real 3.737s  
}}}
Valgrind tools are those shipped with Valgrind 3.6.1

Aprof based on [http://www.pintool.org/ PIN]:
{{{
P1 - DSP(aprof-PIN): space 158512 kB ~ time real 3m48.569s ~ TIME_GETTIMEOFDAY
P1 - DSP(aprof-PIN): space 158548 kB ~ time real 2m5.545s ~ TIME_RDTSC
}}}
